mapper.insert: /* insertProduct */ INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT( SLLR_ID , PRDT_NO , PRDT_PRCE , PRDT_NM , PRDT_DESC , CRT_DT , UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{vo.sllrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vo.prdtNo} , #{vo.prdtPrce} , #{vo.prdtNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vo.prdtDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE, SYSDATE )

/* insertProductImage */ INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE( PRDT_NO , PRDT_IMG_NO , IMG_URL, CRT_DT, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{vo.prdtNo} , #{vo.prdtImgNo} , #{vo.prdtImgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: /* selectProductList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.PRDT_NO DESC) AS RN , A.PRDT_NO as prdtNo , A.PRDT_PRCE as prdtPrce , A.PRDT_NM as prdtNm , A.PRDT_DESC as prdtDesc , A.CRT_DT as crtDt , A.UPD_DT as updDt , A.SLLR_ID as sllrId, B.IMG_URL as image FROM TB_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE B ON A.PRDT_NO = B.PRDT_NO WHERE A.SLLR_ID = #{sllrId} ORDER BY A.CRT_DT DESC ) WHERE #{start} <= RN AND RN < #{end} ORDER BY prdtNo DESC
/* selectProductImageList */ SELECT A.PRDT_NO as prdtNo , A.PRDT_IMG_NO as prdtImgNo , A.IMG_URL as prdtImgUrl FROM TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE A WHERE A.PRDT_NO = #{prdtNo}

/* selectProductDetail */ SELECT A.PRDT_NO as prdtNo , A.PRDT_PRCE as prdtPrce , A.PRDT_NM as prdtNm , A.PRDT_DESC as prdtDesc , A.CRT_DT as crtDt, A.UPD_DT as updDt FROM TB_PRODUCT A WHERE A.PRDT_NO = #{prdtNo}
mapper.update: /* modifyProductImage */ UPDATE TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE SET PRDT_NO = #{vo.prdtNo} , PRDT_IMG_NO = #{vo.prdtImagNo} , IMG_URL = #{vo.prdtImgUrl}, CRT_DT = SYSDATE, UPD_DT = SYSDATE
mapper.delete: /* deleteProduct */ DELETE FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE SLLR_ID = #{vo.sllrId} AND PRDT_NO = #{vo.prdtNo}
/* deleteProductImg */ DELETE FROM TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE PRDT_NO = #{vo.prdtNo}
